lines.text: create integers n , m , mini1 , mini2 , maxi1 , maxi2 , with mini1 = 60 , mini2 = 60 , maxi1 = 0 , maxi2 = 0
lines.code: int n , m , mini1 = 60 , mini2 = 60 , maxi1 = 0 , maxi2 = 0 ;

lines.text: create 2d character array a with size 60 by 60

lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )
for ( int j = 0 ; j < m ; j ++ )

lines.text: set mini1 to minimum of mini1 and i
set mini2 to minimum of mini2 and j
set maxi1 to maximum of maxi1 and i
set maxi2 to maximum of maxi2 and j
for i = mini1 to maxi1 inclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = mini1 ; i <= maxi1 ; i ++ )

lines.text: for j = mini2 to maxi2 inclusive , print a [ i ] [ j ]
lines.code: for ( int j = mini2 ; j <= maxi2 ; j ++ ) cout << a [ i ] [ j ] ;
